job.title: Software Design Engineer - Trolling Motors - Perm!
job.description:
If you are a Software Design Engineer - Trolling Motors with experience, please read on!
Top Reasons to Work with Us
Our location is in the beautiful area of Tulsa, OK, and the cost of living is inexpensive!
We value our employees!
Hot technology and electronic marine industry products.
Stable and growing company.
Career growth!
Test software and the products on the lake!
You will work in a globally distributed team environment continuously pushing the boundaries and capabilities of our products. Self motivated people are appreciated!
We are looking for a talented Software Design Engineer working with Control Systems and Trolling Motors products and will have experience in both testing and software development, with a focus on embedded C and Motor Control Algorithms. The role will involve extensive on-the-water testing of exciting new products.
Seeking a SW Engineer level II position.
Base salary DOE, $70K -$100K
What You Will Be Doing
Perform on-water testing of trolling motor control algorithms
Work within the software team to develop/modify control algorithms
Work with hardware engineers to resolve hardware/software issues
Work with testers, product experts, service, and support of customer issues
What You Need for this Position
Mid-level experience: 3+ years of real-world experience is required.
Bachelors of Science in Electrical Engineering
Embedded microcontroller development experience
Strong C development and debugging skills
Ability to troubleshoot electronics using test equipment
Strong Pluses
CAN bus knowledge
Control Systems knowledge
Experience with the ARM architecture
Hardware design experience
What's In It for You
Our location is beautiful and the cost of living is inexpensive! Great people are here! You will be part of hot technology with a top-notched engineering team and company! If you like to be mentally stimulated, then this is the place!
